DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess systemic absorption disposition tobramycin patient treat tobramycin-laden bone graft substitute ( Osteoset® T ) .
DOC.brief_title: Tobramycin Exposure From Active Calcium Sulfate Bone Graft Substitute
DOC.criteria: Adult ( > =18 year old ) patient Treatment Osteoset® T Intravenous tobramycin
